title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2023 about goal awareness for conversational systems or conversational agents. The list should contain articles related to making more intelligent conversational agents
Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2023 about goal awareness for conversational systems or conversational agents, focusing on making more intelligent conversational agents
Designing Intelligent Conversational Agents: A Review of the Literature

This article provides a comprehensive review of the literature on designing intelligent conversational agents, covering topics such as natural language understanding, dialogue management, and user modeling
A Survey of Goal-aware Dialogue Systems
